detaileddescription.para: Set simulated latency in milliseconds. This adds a fixed delay before sending each packet. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set simulated packet loss probability between 0.0 - 1.0. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Register a remote event as allowed to be received. There is also a fixed blacklist of events that can not be allowed in any case, such as ConsoleCommand.
Unregister a remote event as allowed to received.
Unregister all remote events.

detaileddescription.para: Set the package download cache directory. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Trigger all client connections in the specified scene to download a package file from the server. Can be used to download additional resource packages when clients are already joined in the scene. The package must have been added as a requirement to the scene, or else the eventual download will fail.

briefdescription.para: Perform an HTTP request to the specified URL. Empty verb defaults to a GET request. Return a request object which can be used to read the response data.
